translation.Message_0_Page_0: I'm sorry, but we don't recruit <color=uncommon>Ensigns</color> without first seeing what you can do. If we notice you helping out around here there's a place for you in our ranks, however!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We are looking for someone to help getting some things done around here! <pause>- if you're interested, make sure you talk with <color=legendary>Commander Barlow</color>, and <color=epic>Major Lee</color>.
